func.title: GetDefCoreVal

param.name: entry
param.desc: Name of the entry to be retrieved.

param.name: section
param.desc: Section of the entry to be retrieved. If not specified, all sections will be searched for an entry of the specified name.

param.name: entry_number
param.desc: Index of the value to be retrieved if an entry contains multiple values.

func.desc: Returns the property value of an object definition by its name in the DefCore.txt.
func.remark: If the requested entry is an id list (e.g. "Components" in DefCore.txt) an even entry_number will return the listed id and an uneven entry_number will return the matching count (see example).

example.text:
Determines the necessary components for construction of a workshop.
The loop will run until GetDefCoreVal returns id nil which means the end of the list.
